name: Ham it Down
description:
Once upon a time there was the Big Bad Wolf. To satisfy his belly he decided to besiege the home of the 3 - . . . wtf? 4 little Piggies??
But no time to think about it! The Big Bad Wolf is already at the door!
The Piggies tremble in fear, although one of them is shaken differently for another purpose.
As all of them try to reinforce their home with the ressources they dispose
[X button], suddenly pieces of the barricades start to fall apart. Not only because of the Big Bad Wolf ramming the house, but also because of some few loose screws.
- The Traitor places fake reinforcements that ruins barricades after 20 seconds, or directly by pressing [A] -
The real Piggies will have to be observant in order to snoop out the Traitor.
They can stun a suspect with a nasty pork slap [B button] ! But be aware the traitor can also be nasty, and ANY Piggie will faint permanently after too many continious slaps!
Pork together until the Big Bad Wolf goes away...or gets in.
